alert.note: Alert for Otero Mesa; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 21 at 8:58PM MDT until May 22 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...East winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...West Slopes of the Franklin and Organ Mountains, including West El Paso, the Otero Mesa, and Hudspeth County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM MDT Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur along the west-facing slopes of area mountains.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Otero Mesa; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
